name: RR-Blue Line
origin: Ratopia line-bred from imported agouti/blue carriers
notes: Selected for outgoing but not hyper personalities, with a focus on clean respiratory histories and tidy coat condition.

name: RR-Temperament Line
origin: Ratopia, built from multiple pet and breeder lines
notes: This line is built around rats that actively seek human interaction and recover quickly from stress, with an emphasis on low startle response.
